step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed as you begin the roll.
Excellent! Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together and down.
Nice circular motion. Try to keep your wrists more relaxed.
Good second rep. Remember to initiate the movement from your shoulder blades.
Great job maintaining the squeeze! Keep the motion smooth and controlled.
Well done! Focus on a smooth, continuous circle and relax your wrists.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your wrists relaxed throughout the movement to maximize the benefit for your shoulders and lymphatic flow.
